base_description: Rectangular gray cabinet with two doors.
part_description: The cabinet has two rectangular doors with handles, positioned side by side. Each door has a vertical handle located near the outer edge. The top surface is flat and rectangular.
internal_interaction_description: The two doors are hinged on the sides, allowing them to swing open and closed. The handles provide a grip for opening the doors. The interior space is accessible when the doors are open, providing storage within the cabinet.
external_interaction_description: The cabinet can be placed against a wall or integrated into a kitchen setup. Users interact with it by opening the doors via the handles to access stored items. It may support a countertop or other objects placed on its flat top surface.
